article: Beethoven was one of the greatest composers in the world. He was born  _  Germany in 1770. Even as a child,Beethoven did not have a  _  life. His father was a singer, but he was very lazy and always drank a lot. When Beethoven was only four, his father decided to make him a  _  . So Beethoven had to play  the music  . He learned very fast and he could go around and give a  _  when he was only eleven. A few years later Beethoven went to Vienna to study under Haydn, a famous Austrian composer. Soon he could write a lot of music himself. Beethoven was often  _  in his life. After one illness, he became deaf . He couldn't  _  any more. This didn't stop Beethoven. He continued  to write  many pieces of beautiful music. To everyone's  _  ,Beethoven wrote his most beautiful pieces such as Destiny after he became deaf. He died at the age of  _  in 1827.
